item.description:
Bands "dressing up" as Radiohead, The Clash, The Smiths, and The Sounds on the night before Halloween? Um, yes please. Dress up, come out, dance and sing along until you are physically incapable of producing sound anymore. (Thanks to Luke for the suggestion!)

- The Pill's 7th annual Halloween Show
- The Daily Pravda as RADIOHEAD (website)
- Televandals as THE CLASH (website)
- The Honors as THE SMITHS (website)
- Lindsey Starr & the Chemical Smiles as THE SOUNDS
- DJs Ken & Michael V.

- Age Restrictions: 21+
- Doors Open: 8pm
- Ticket Price: $10.00
- Advanced: (buy tickets)

The Pill's 7th annual Halloween Show & Dance Party, featuring: The Daily Pravda as RADIOHEAD Televandals as THE CLASH The Honors as THE SMITHS Lindsey Starr & the Chemical Smiles as THE SOUNDS and DJs Ken & Michael V spinning Britpop, Modern Indie & Beyond. Doors at 8pm (the show starts at 9pm sharp), tickets are $10 and it's, as usual, 21-plus. Go to www.thepillboston.com for more details. Costumes are encouraged.
item.name: The Pill Halloween Show (Radiohead, Clash & Smiths cover bands) @ Great Scott
